page.title: 19TOURISM IN HALWELL&MORELEIGH
page.content: The villages of Halwell and Moreleigh are situated 10kms from Kingsbridge and Totnes. Tourists come here to enjoy the beauty and tranquility of the countryside. The area is within easy reach of the coastline, along which are sandy bays suitable for the family and there are cliff top walks for the more energetic. The River Dart nearby offers further sporting activities and to the North is The Dartmoor National Park,ideal for walkers. Halwell has only one Hotel,open from Easter to mid-November and many of its guests are foreign. There are two caravan sites and bed and breakfast accommodation is available from some of the villagers.
